title: Episode 6: How Will Washington Get Around In The Year 2026?
dc:creator: Martin Di Caro
description: In the latest Metropocalypse, we explore the future of Metro: What will the system look like in 10 years? Should responsibility for running the system be passed off to the private sector? How will the introduction of driverless cars and other technologies impact the system?
